modName: Replacer for skyforge steel sword Steel Sword and Great Swor
summary: Replacer for skyforge steel sword and Steel Sword and Steel Great Sword
descriptionHtml:
Ok so someone made a comment on the Customised Steel Themed outfit I created 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=976

Saying that He was only using the retextures of the Swords instead of the whole outfit So for anyone else interested in just using the package for that I have created a seperate file for them to use rather than having to look through the package to find it 

:)
author: Daniel Bourne

files.name: Steel Sword and Greatsword Replacer textures
files.fileName: Steel Sword and Greatsword Replacer textures-1201-1-0-0.rar
